participant_1.background:
My favorite drink is caramel cappuccino.
My parents live across the street from me.
I love to read true crime books.
I m in grad school.
I work in a coffee shop.

participant_2.background:
When i shower my skin is nearly red from how hard i scrub.
I have horrible allergies.
I can t stand clutter or dust.
I spend an hour getting ready in the morning.

content.text: Hi! What do you like to do in your free time?
I like to read, bake, and go for walks in the park.
I like those things too! I also love to watch true crime documentaries.
Me too! I'm always looking for new ones to watch.
Have you seen the one about the Zodiac Killer?
No, I haven't. Is it good?
It's really good! It's about a serial killer who was never caught.
That sounds really interesting. I'll have to check it out.
You should! I also like the one about the Manson family murders.
I've heard good things about that one too. I'll have to add it to my list.
I have a lot of true crime books too. Do you like to read them?
I do! I love reading about all the different cases.
Me too! I think it's so fascinating to learn about the psychology behind crimes.
Me too! It's really interesting to try to understand why people do the things they do.
Yeah, it is. I think it's important to try to understand the human condition, even when it's dark and twisted.
I agree. It's important to learn from our mistakes and try to make the world a better place.
I think so too. I'm glad we agree on something!
Me too! I'm glad we met.
Me too! I hope we can talk again sometime.
I'd like that too.
